title:
On Green's function of the vorticity formulation for the 3D
  Navier-Stokes equations
authors: Igor Kukavica, Fei Wang, and Yichun Zhu
abstract:
We give a novel vorticity formulation for the 3D Navier-Stokes equations with
Dirichlet boundary conditions. Via a resolvent argument, we obtain Green's
function and establish an upper bound, which is the 3D analog of [24].
Moreover, we prove similar results for the corresponding Stokes problem with
more general mixed boundary conditions.
